original_text: Then the boundary goes up by the Valley of the Son of Hinnom at the southern shoulder of the Jebusite (that is, Jerusalem). And the boundary goes up to the top of the mountain that lies over against the Valley of Hinnom, on the west, at the northern end of the Valley of Rephaim.
korean_text: 또 힌놈의 아들의 골짜기로 올라가서 여부스 곧 예루살렘 남쪽 어깨에 이르며 또 힌놈의 골짜기 앞 서쪽에 있는 산 꼭대기로 올라가나니 이곳은 르바임 골짜기 북쪽 끝이며

sentences.original_text: by the Valley of the Son of Hinnom
at the southern shoulder of the Jebusite
to the top of the mountain
that lies over against the Valley of Hinnom
sentences.korean_translation: 그 산은 힌놈 골짜기 맞은편에 있습니다

sentences.original_text: at the northern end of the Valley of Rephaim
